title: In the lap of luxury
text:
Home » travel » In the lap of luxury GETAWAYS In the lap of luxury THE NATION October 21, 2015 8:23 am 
137 Pillars House Chiang Mai The award-winning 137 Pillars House Chiang Mai has partnered with Bangkok-based VIP Jets based in Bangkok in offering the luxury "Private Jet Package". CHIANG MAI In the lap of luxury The award-winning 137 Pillars House Chiang Mai has partnered with Bangkok-based VIP Jets based in Bangkok in offering the luxury "Private Jet Package". The offer includes round trip flights between Bangkok and Chiang Mai for two in a private Cessna Citation Mustang Jet, two nights in the luxurious Louis Leonowens Pool Suite, round trip limousine transfers from Chiang Mai International Airport, a complimentary bottle of Champagne or fresh juices and Thai Tapas or Finger foods on arrival, daily buffet breakfast for two or a la carte breakfast in your suite, a SilverNeedle Collection Classic Afternoon Tea Experience on The Lawn, complimentary late check-out until 6pm (subject to availability), commemorative gift upon departure, priority booking at The Spa and complimentary Wi-Fi. The package is priced at Bt651,600 (USD18,100) based on double occupancy and is valid from November 1 to April 30. Call (053) 247 788 or e-mail: stay@137pillarshouse.com. Visit www.137PillarsHouse.com. PATTAYA Off with the old, on with the new Amari Pattaya has prepared a grand festive season programme to celebrate the end of 2015 and usher in 2016. Kicking off the programme is the Christmas Tree Lighting on December 8 at the Ocean Tower Lobby, followed by an exhilarating Sparkling Wine Experience on December 11 at the Garden Lounge for Bt950 per person. New Year's Eve parties on December 31, will be held at three different venues. The Party Grounds hosts the "Colour n' Rhythm" event with a spectacular gala dinner with a grandiose fireworks display at midnight for Bt3,800 per person and Bt1,900 per child aged 6 to 12. Tavern by The Sea Bar & Restaurant is hosting the "Disco Night Party" for Bt999 per person and Bt499 per child. Mantra Restaurant & Bar is going big with a "The Great Gatsby Night" for Bt4,299 per person and a special kid's set for Bt2,150. Call (038) 418 418 or e-mail: fbreservation.pattaya@amari.com. BANGKOK Picnic in Provence Join Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok's "L'Occitane Wine Dinner" on November 13 at La Vue. This exclusive 6-course wine dinner, which gets underway at 6.30, combines ingredients from Provence with the region's wines and is priced at Bt3,600 complete with a L'Occitane Gift Set valued Bt1,500. The menu features Fresh duck and foie gras tartare with figs semi-confit in lavender; Porquerolles fish soup, garlic crouton aioli rouille Provencale; Peach sherbet and much more. Call (02) 217 3000 or e-mail: fbrsvn@siamatsiam.com. In a ghostly groove This Halloween, get your groove on at the So Pool Party at Sofitel So Bangkok. Enjoy eight hours of beats from special guest DJs Joyyly, Georges LG, Honey G, GGAG & Natsha Freake. Admission costs Bt400 per person (including 1 drink) and the party runs from 1 to 9pm at The Water Club. Get there before 3 to enjoy a free Halloween Cocktail and show your So Pool Party waistband at So Haunted Halloween Party at Park Society Terrace and pay Bt200 per person before 9.30pm to continue the spooky night. Call (02) 624 0000 or e-mail: h6835-fb3@sofitel.com. PHUKET Tropical treat U Zenmaya Phuket, a luxury resort located on Kalim Beach, welcomes the cool season with a special rate of Bt3,999 per night in a Superior Room for Thai residents. Rates are inclusive of breakfast and the offer is valid from now until December 22. Call (076) 336 888 or e-mail: reserve@uzenmaya phuket .com. Visit www.UZenmayaPhuket.com. KRABI Spa sensations Throughout November, Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort invites couples to enjoy a special "His & Her Package" at So Spa with L'Occitane. The blissful treatment includes a 30-minute Aromatic Thai Steam Bath, followed by a 60-minute Shea Body Treatment with L’Occitane’s products, and finishes with a 60-minute relaxing Aromachologie Massage for her, and 60-minute Deep Tissue Intense Relief Massage for him, all for Bt6,500 per couple. Call (075) 627 800 or e-mail: h6184-th@sofitel.com. 133 Viewed
